abilities.name: Water Cyclone
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy attached to 1 of your Active Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Swampert is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Spinning Tail
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aqua Sonic
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
